This commit represents the stable baseline before integrating outputs

## Data Pipeline (Complete)
- Real Census Bureau data (2015-2024) for 53 states
- 8,016 monthly permit records from annual state data
- 6 reform states analyzed (CA, OR, MN, VA, NC, MT)
- 41 counties with synthetic drill-down data
- ML predictive model (R^2 = -10.98, needs improvement)

## Next.js Dashboard (Complete)
- Interactive choropleth map with all 53 states
- State detail panels and county drill-down
- State comparison tool
- Reform timeline animation
- WRLURI scatter plot
- ML predictions display
- Responsive design with Tailwind CSS v4

## Scripts Pipeline
- 06_use_real_annual_data.py - Census data downloader
- 04_compute_comprehensive_metrics.py - Pre/post analysis
- 07_build_all_states_metrics.py - Baseline metrics
- 09_generate_sample_county_data.py - County data generator
- 10_build_predictive_model.py - Random Forest model
- validate_data_quality.py - Data quality checks (5/5 passed)
